Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted Sri Lanka as the favorites given their home advantage.
In their last 5 games, West Indies have won 1 games and lost 4. In their last 5 games, Sri Lanka have won 3 games and lost 1.

Both teams last played against each other in the Super Sixes - Match 9 of the ICC Cricket World Cup Qualifiers, 2023 where Pathum Nissanka scored the highest fantasy points for Sri Lanka with 138 match fantasy points while Keacy Carty topped the fantasy points leaderboard for West Indies with 103 match fantasy points.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Kandy will allow for good stroke play and the batters will find it easy to bat on the surface.
The surface will not allow a lot of assistance to the bowlers and wicket taking is not going to be easy.
The average 1st innings score at this venue in the last 20 matches is 236 runs.
There is light rain expected which may affect playing conditions.
The team batting first at this venue has won 40% of its matches, so the toss does not make much of a difference here.
The venue is suited for both Pacers and Spinners alike.
